bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: This volume was written by an unknown author and contains a long-form manuscript addressed to the author's sons. The manuscript consists of religious, moral, and general life advice which was presumably meant to outlast the author himself. No other information is available regarding the history of this item.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This manuscript, dated 1694, was inserted into in a repurposed manuscript volume, as evidenced by the crossed-out pages of note preceding the title page. The manuscript, written to the author's surviving sons, consists of the principle manuscript on the right-hand pages, with additions, insertions, and corrections made on the left-hand pages.
